Package net.dapete.locks

Class Locks<K,L extends Lock>

java.lang.Object
net.dapete.locks.Locks<K,L>
Type Parameters:
K - type of key
L - type of Lock
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReentrantLocks
public class Locks<K,L extends Lock> extends Object
Key-based locking with implementations of Lock.
